oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Elgin P. Kintner, M.D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Rich Mountain
Cold Spring Knob
Sugarland Mountain
Annotated
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: uncaptioned
Panorama taken looking East from the Rich Mountain Fire Tower with Sugarland Mountain on left and Cold Spring Knob on right. The fire tower is no longer standing.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: View of Thunderhead and Clingmans Dome from High Rocks ? Annotated
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Elgin P. Kintner, M.D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: High Rocks
Thunderhead Mountain
Clingmans Dome
Annotated
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: view from High Rocks.
Panorama taken looking North from High Rocks Fire tower, which was removed in the 1980s, viewing Thunderhead on left and Clingmans Dome on right.
